title: Refunds
body:
I think we can all agree that some of us may have made some poor choices with the spending of our RP during our league career and it seems unfair that we can only get 3 refunds forever on a single account, is there any chance that riot would be willing to refresh our refunds once every 1-2 years? Even though it doesn't seem like that big of a thing, i'm sure the league community would really appreciate it. I know I would. :p
- OptimusPrimal

I used 2 of my 3 before I was level 30 LOL

I said before, I think they should give you a refund ticket as part of the "rewarding good behavior" crap at the end of the season.

I always thought you should just get one at the end of the year, no matter how badly you behaved. Like, Riot's not even losing money from that because we have to buy the RP first. It seems like a healthy business practice to me.

It should be based on *X* games played... similar to dice rolls in ARAM, every 100 something games played you can get a refund, therefore you're not just waiting for the Cooldown, but you're earning the refund. I also think the same system should be in place for Queue dodging Ranked games. ever 50 odd games you should be able to dodge once for free... no 5 minutes, no loss of LP.... last week i dc'd twice in champion select, until then i had never dodged, and i've played 1000s of ranked games since season 1.
